QuestData.Title: Sending a Message
QuestData.Description: I haf eyes and ears in every corner of zhis region, $r.$b$bI haf heard of zhe murmurings zhat go on amonkst my troops. I haf been most tolerant of zhis pathetic behavior - until now!$b$bI vill send zhe message to everyvone in my ranks, zhat dissension vill not be tolerated!$b$bYou are to exterminate zhe captains aboard my ships in dock. Zhey haf been amonk zhe most disgruntled.$b$bVhen zhis has been done, I vill monitor zhe communications and determine vhat to do next.$b$bDismissed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Schnottz wants you to kill Captain Margun, Captain Cork, and Captain Kronkh.
QuestData.CompletionText: Haf my orders been carried out, $r?
